name: Milan After Dark
description:
Game is part of Vampire Jam 2021 - It's my first game ever created in Twine.

It's kinda my first experience ever in creating any games or coding so it's more like a text game with some options. I hope you're gonna enjoy it a little and don't be shy to leave a comment - any feedback is welcomed :)

Every picture or art is used on a free license either provided by free art pack from vtm, pexels.com and all art is used on a free license. 

The main story is about young vampire Misha trying to find himself or herself around (I was kinda careful during the writing process about trying to write in a way, that anyone can identify). English also isn't my first language, but I tried my best.

Try to survive these final nights in Milan and just vibe with your coterie trying to survive.

I just hope you're gonna enjoy the ride, neonate :) PS: please let me know about any bugs, missing pictures or any problems with the game
